description: A real person, alive or dead
title: Person

___additional_name.description: One or more secondary given names

___given_name.description: One or more primary given names

___honorific_prefix.description: One or more honorifics preceding a person's name

$eref.description: A means of contacting an entity
$eref.title: Contact detail

___valid_from.description: The date from which the contact detail is valid

___type.description: A type of medium, e.g. 'fax' or 'email'

___created_at.description: The time at which the resource was created

___value.description: A value, e.g. a phone number or email address

___sources.description: URLs to documents from which the contact detail is derived

___updated_at.description: The time at which the resource was last modified

___note.description: A note, e.g. for grouping contact details by physical location

___valid_until.description: The date from which the contact detail is no longer valid

___label.description: A human-readable label for the contact detail

$eref.description: A relationship between a member and an organization
$eref.title: Membership

___person_id.description: The ID of the person who is a member of the organization

___on_behalf_of.description: The organization on whose behalf the person is a member of the organization

___post.description: The post held by the member in the organization through this membership

___on_behalf_of_id.description: The ID of the organization on whose behalf the person is a member of the organization

___created_at.description: The time at which the resource was created

___links.description: URLs to documents about the membership

___end_date.description: The date on which the relationship ended

___role.description: The role that the member fulfills in the organization

___sources.description: URLs to documents from which the membership is derived

___organization.description: The organization in which the person or organization is a member

___contact_details.description: Means of contacting the member of the organization

___start_date.description: The date on which the relationship began

___organization_id.description: The ID of the organization in which the person or organization is a member

___area.description: The geographic area to which this membership is related

___area_id.description: The ID of the geographic area to which this membership is related

___updated_at.description: The time at which the resource was last modified

___person.description: The person who is a member of the organization

___member.description: The person or organization that is a member of the organization

___post_id.description: The ID of the post held by the member in the organization through this membership

___created_at.description: The time at which the resource was created

___links.description: URLs to documents about the person

___honorific_suffix.description: One or more honorifics following a person's name

___image.description: A URL of a head shot

___sources.description: URLs to documents from which the person is derived

___identifier.description: An issued identifier, e.g. a DUNS number

___biography.description: An extended account of a person's life

___honorific_prefix.description: One or more honorifics preceding a person's name

___start_date.description: The date on which the name was adopted

___additional_name.description: One or more secondary given names

___honorific_suffix.description: One or more honorifics following a person's name

___given_name.description: One or more primary given names

___end_date.description: The date on which the name was abandoned

___updated_at.description: The time at which the resource was last modified

___summary.description: A one-line account of a person's life

___sort_name.description: A name to use in a lexicographically ordered list
